backlogItems.title: New E-commerce Platform
backlogItems.notes:
Training Notes:

ITEM 

FOR online shoppers 
WHO want a modern and reliable way to buy our products,
THE "Ignite" E-commerce Platform
IS A next-generation online storefront
THAT provides a fast, secure, and personalized shopping experience. 
UNLIKE our current slow, buggy, and outdated legacy website,
OUR SOLUTION creates a scalable new revenue stream and meets modern customer expectations. 

JOB SIZE 

- C: Requires new infrastructure, many API integrations, and a new tech stack. 
- E: This will take multiple teams several quarters to build and launch. 
- D: There are many unknowns regarding customer adoption, final performance, and unforeseen technical hurdles.

COST OF DELAY 

- BV: This is a core new revenue stream for the company. 
- TC: The market window is closing, and competitors are already launching similar platforms. 
- RR/OE: It mitigates the risk of the old, failing legacy platform and opens new opportunities. 

Group Notes:

[ Your notes here ]

backlogItems.title: AI Customer Service Bot
backlogItems.notes:
Training Notes:

ITEM 

FOR customer service operations 
WHO are overwhelmed with high-volume, repetitive support tickets,
THE "AssistAI" Support Bot
IS AN automated support agent
THAT provides instant, 24/7 answers to common customer questions. 
UNLIKE 100% manual human support, which is slow and expensive,
OUR SOLUTION reduces operational costs and frees up agents for complex issues. 

JOB SIZE 

- C: Involves brand new AI tech and complex data modeling. 
- E: Requires a small, but highly specialized, team of data scientists. 
- D: This is pure R&D. The outcome is highly uncertain.

COST OF DELAY 

- BV: Enormous potential for operational cost savings in the support center. 
- TC: No one is waiting for this. There is no external deadline. 
- RR/OE: This is a pure "Opportunity Enablement". 

Group Notes:

[ Your notes here ]

backlogItems.title: Fix Checkout Payment Bug
backlogItems.notes:
Training Notes:

ITEM 

FOR customers trying to make a purchase 
WHO are currently unable to complete their order due to a payment error,
THE Checkout Payment Hotfix
IS A critical bug fix
THAT restores the ability to successfully process payments. 
UNLIKE the current broken checkout,
OUR SOLUTION immediately stops revenue loss and prevents customer churn. 

JOB SIZE 

- C: The bug is in a known code section. 
- E: A single developer can fix this in a day or two. 
- D: The fix is well-understood.

COST OF DELAY 

- BV: Directly stops customer churn and loss of sales. 
- TC: The company is actively losing money *every day* this bug exists. 
- RR/OE: Low. This is just a fix, no new risk or opportunity. 

Group Notes:

[ Your notes here ]

backlogItems.title: Mandatory GDPR Compliance Update
backlogItems.notes:
Training Notes:

ITEM 

FOR the company's legal and executive leadership 
WHO must meet a mandatory, fixed legal deadline for new data privacy regulations,
THE GDPR Compliance Update
IS A mandatory regulatory feature
THAT implements required data handling and consent mechanisms. 
UNLIKE our current non-compliant system,
OUR SOLUTION avoids massive legal fines and reputational damage. 

JOB SIZE 

- C: The legal requirements are clearly defined and documented. 
- E: Requires a data audit and coordination across several teams. 
- D: The work is unambiguous; there is no uncertainty.

COST OF DELAY 

- BV: Generates zero new revenue. Customers will not see this. 
- TC: There is a fixed, non-negotiable legal deadline! 
- RR/OE: Avoids massive, company-threatening fines (pure "Risk Reduction"). 

Group Notes:

[ Your notes here ]

backlogItems.title: Cloud Migration (Phase 1)
backlogItems.notes:
Training Notes:

ITEM 

FOR the DevOps and Operations teams 
WHO are burdened with maintaining aging, on-premise hardware,
THE Cloud Migration (Phase 1)
IS AN infrastructure modernization project
THAT moves the first batch of legacy apps to a scalable cloud environment. 
UNLIKE our current unstable and expensive data center,
OUR SOLUTION reduces operational risk, lowers hosting costs, and enables future scalability. 

JOB SIZE 

- C: "Lifting and shifting" old legacy apps always uncovers hidden dependencies. 
- E: A significant amount of operations and engineering work, blocking the Ops team. 
- D: The migration patterns are known, but surprises in legacy code are likely.

COST OF DELAY 

- BV: Main value is internal (operational cost savings), not new revenue. 
- TC: The old hardware is "End of Life" next year. There is a deadline, but it's not immediate. 
- RR/OE: Reduces the operational risk of a catastrophic hardware failure. 

Group Notes:

[ Your notes here ]

backlogItems.title: APAC Market Expansion Analysis
backlogItems.notes:
Training Notes:

ITEM 

FOR the strategic leadership team 
WHO need to decide whether to invest in the APAC market,
THE APAC Expansion Feasibility Report
IS A strategic analysis (Enabler)
THAT delivers a data-driven recommendation on market viability. 
UNLIKE making a high-risk decision based on gut feeling,
OUR SOLUTION provides the data to make an informed "Go/No-Go" decision. 

JOB SIZE 

- C: This is complex *research* (legal, cultural, market), not complex *coding*. 
- E: Only requires a small, dedicated strategy team for a few weeks. 
- D: The outcome of the analysis is completely unknown.

COST OF DELAY 

- BV: The analysis itself doesn't create value, but it *enables* a huge future value. 
- TC: There is a potential "first-mover" advantage, but no hard deadline. 
- RR/OE: Pure "Opportunity Enablement" to unlock a massive new market. 

Group Notes:

[ Your notes here ]

backlogItems.title: Internal CRM Upgrade
backlogItems.notes:
Training Notes:

ITEM 

FOR the internal sales team 
WHO are slowed down by an outdated CRM,
THE CRM vNext Upgrade
IS AN internal system upgrade
THAT provides automated workflows and better reporting. 
UNLIKE the current tool, which requires high manual effort,
OUR SOLUTION increases sales team efficiency and improves data quality. 

JOB SIZE 

- C: All existing sales processes must be mapped to the new version. 
- E: Involves data migration and training for the entire sales department. 
- D: It's a standard vendor product; the process is known and documented.

COST OF DELAY 

- BV: Provides internal efficiency gains for the sales team. 
- TC: The current CRM is an "annoyance", but not critically broken. No urgency. 
- RR/OE: Slightly reduces the risk of data-entry errors. 

Group Notes:

[ Your notes here ]

backlogItems.title: Rebranding Website & App
backlogItems.notes:
Training Notes:

ITEM 

FOR the Marketing department 
WHO need to launch the new company brand identity to the public,
THE Digital Rebranding Initiative
IS A brand implementation project
THAT updates all public digital assets with the new visual identity. 
UNLIKE our current, disjointed brand experience,
OUR SOLUTION presents a unified, modern brand to the market. 

JOB SIZE 

- C: It's mostly design/CSS work, but it touches every single part of the UI. 
- E: Many different assets (Web, iOS, Android) and repositories need to be updated. 
- D: The new brand guide is final and specifications are clear.

COST OF DELAY 

- BV: Crucial for new market perception and brand alignment. 
- TC: It is tied to a specific marketing launch event in the next quarter. 
- RR/OE: No specific risk or new opportunity. 

Group Notes:

[ Your notes here ]

backlogItems.title: Automate Monthly Billing
backlogItems.notes:
Training Notes:

ITEM 

FOR the Finance department 
WHO spend 20 person-days per month manually creating invoices,
THE Automated Billing System
IS A process automation feature
THAT automatically generates and sends accurate monthly invoices. 
UNLIKE the current slow, error-prone manual process,
OUR SOLUTION frees up 20 days/month of employee time and eliminates costly billing errors. 

JOB SIZE 

- C: The billing logic (tax, discounts) is complex. 
- E: Can be handled by one small, focused team in a single sprint. 
- D: The rules are all known; this is a straightforward (though complex) automation.

COST OF DELAY 

- BV: This directly saves 20 person-days of manual finance work *every single month*. 
- TC: The manual process (barely) works, so it's not a P0 fire. 
- RR/OE: High "Risk Reduction" of sending costly incorrect invoices. 

Group Notes:

[ Your notes here ]

backlogItems.title: A/B Test New Homepage Slogan
backlogItems.notes:
Training Notes:

ITEM 

FOR the Digital Marketing team 
WHO want to know if a new slogan can increase homepage conversion,
THE Homepage Slogan A/B Test
IS A market experiment
THAT serves two slogans to visitors and measures the impact on sign-ups. 
UNLIKE guessing which slogan is better,
OUR SOLUTION provides quick, cheap data to optimize our conversion funnel. 

JOB SIZE 

- C: A simple text change in the A/B testing tool. 
- E: A single developer, less than one day. 
- D: The A/B test setup is a standard, well-known procedure.

COST OF DELAY 

- BV: Has *potential* high value (increased conversion) but isn't guaranteed. 
- TC: No urgency at all. 
- RR/OE: A small "Opportunity Enablement" to learn about our customers. 

Group Notes:

[ Your notes here ]
